[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive.move] [Friend: lending] [Trust Assumption] Module trusts lending_core::lending as friend - what prevents lending module from maliciously calling update_reward with manipulated parameters? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive.move] [Friend: incentive_v2] [Migration Risk] incentive_v2 is friend - could incentive_v2 bypass security checks during migration, draining rewards? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive.move] [Friend: update_reward] [Parameter Validation] update_reward trusts friend callers to provide valid asset and account - what if invalid values cause state corruption? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive.move] [Function: calc_pool_update_rewards()] [Storage Dependency] Line 251 calls storage::get_total_supply - if storage is corrupted or returns wrong values, could rewards be miscalculated? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive.move] [Function: calc_pool_update_rewards()] [User Balance] Line 273 calls storage::get_user_balance - if user balance is manipulated between update_reward and claim, could rewards be inflated? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive.move] [Function: update_reward()] [Storage Mutation] Function takes mutable storage reference - could concurrent storage access cause race conditions? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive.move] [Function: add_pool()] [Start Time Equals End Time] If start_time == end_time - 1, duration is 1ms - will ray_div produce infinite rate? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive.move] [Function: base_claim_reward()] [Claim After Pool End] If user claims after end_time, are rewards properly calculated for the full period or could late claims receive less? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive.move] [Function: update_reward()] [First Update] When last_update_time=0 (initial state), lines 238-241 use start_time directly - could this cause double-counting if start_time is in past? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive.move] [Function: update_reward()] [Loop Gas Cost] Lines 200-220 loop through all pools for an asset - if asset has many pools, could this exceed gas limits causing DoS? (Medium)
